forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the crisp air holds a quiet promise of a beautiful day. The night has left behind a coolness that wraps gently around you, inviting a light jacket or a cozy sweater. The forecast hints at a bright, sunny day, with a high reaching about 62 degrees in the afternoon, so layers will serve you well, allowing for comfort as the sun gradually warms the city.

Currently, clarity reigns, with the horizon stretching out toward the Golden Gate, the water shimmering invitingly, although some pockets of the marine layer may linger in the more sheltered nooks, particularly around the coast. The early hours reveal a calmness, accentuated by soft breezes from the north, perfect for a leisurely morning stroll. As the day unfolds, consider a visit to a local café, enjoying a warm drink while basking in the sun’s embrace on a patio. The tranquility of this winter morning is best savored with quiet contemplation, whether seated by a window overlooking the waking city or walking among the familiar streets.
